data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 20,711 believers in Trujillo Alto to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Trujillo Alto, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Trujillo Alto against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 63,700 citizens of Trujillo Alto, Puerto Rico, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 20,711 believers in Trujillo Alto and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Trujillo Alto, Puerto Rico that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Trujillo Alto, Puerto Rico so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Trujillo Alto, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Trujillo Alto, Puerto Rico has a population of 63,700.

We estimate Trujillo Alto has 20,711 people who might know Jesus, 39,516 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,473 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.
